data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Unfortunately, for many formats we don't have this documentation. In ____ a well-known implementation ____ a ____ algorithm ____ been ____ it ____ often ____ easy ____ reverse ____. Such ____ file ____ tend ____ start ____ a ____ identifier ( magic ____ ), clearly ____ the ____ compressed ____. The compression tool has left its "fingerprint" in place.
data.partBlankContent: Unfortunately, for many formats we don't have this documentation. In ca__ a well-known implementation o_ a parti_____ algorithm h__ been us__ it i_ often relat_____ easy t_ reverse engi____. Such compr_____ file for____ tend t_ start wi__ a for___ identifier ( magic num___ ), clearly ident______ the parti_____ compressed for___. The compression tool has left its "fingerprint" in place.
data.answer: 不幸的是，对于许多格式，我们没有这个文档。如果使用了某一特定算法的知名实现，那么反向工程通常是相对容易的。这种压缩文件格式往往以正式的标识符(魔术数字)开始，清楚地标识特定的压缩格式。压缩工具留下了它的“指纹”。
